cause.description:
Millions of children are left as orphans as a result of AIDS yearly. The governments of the countries affected, have done little to help (i speak mainly from what i know of the SOuth African government). A cure must be found. And said cure must be made accessible to those who need it.
1. to Find a cure for the AIDS/HIV virus
2. to make the cure affordable
cause.mission: Try to find a cure for HIV/AIDS
cause.name: Find a cure for AIDS/HIV
